author: cdevienne
msg: Added config_auto_log4cxx.h to log4cxxinc_HEADERS so a 'make install' from
a separate build tree install it.

author: cdevienne
msg: - Fix global namespace pollution. I had to modify the .cpp files in addition
- Add -I$(top_builddir)/include to INCLUDES in the different Makefile.am
files, so we can successfully build in a separate tree.

author: cdevienne
msg: Moved simplesocketserver to a separate directory.
Having it in src made "make -j N" fail most of the time because is depends
on liblog4cxx which is constructed in src.
